casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
John Ervin BLYTHER. No. 275P04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 5, 2004. John Blyther, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Defendant on the 28th day of July 2004 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus Ad Testificandum, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Wake County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of August 2004."
